home.title: Efficient solution for finding IT teams
home.subtitle: With connectTeam, you can easily find a development team or create your own project
projectDescription.description: Add a project description so applicants can find your project faster
markDownPlaceholder: Format the description as you like: make text bold, italicize it, or underline it. Create lists to organize your thoughts, add sections and headings to make everything look neat and organized. You can also add links
whoNeeded: Who do you need in your team?
creator: Creator
settingsAdditionalText: Here you can change your profile settings
onlyTeamInfo: Information visible only to the team
requiredContact: Please specify the preferred communication method so that others can contact you
writeAboutMe: Write a few words about yourself
searchITTeams: Search for IT teams and developers for your projects
responseError: Unfortunately, an error occurred while processing your request. Please contact support
noProjectsFound: Unfortunately, no projects were found matching your criteria
